channel.title: Spamming scar script!
channel.description:
in scar copy and past this begin wait(2000) repeat sendkeys ('WOW!') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) sendkeys ('WOW') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) sendkeys ('WO') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) sendkeys ('W') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) sendkeys ('WO') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) sendkeys ('WOW') keydown(13) wait(5000) keyup(13) until(false) end.
p.s sorry i messed up on it i forgot until (false) on it
p.s2 u can also use this for runescape just change where it says sendkeys

item.title: Spamming scar script!
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

in scar copy and past this
begin
wait(2000)
repeat
sendkeys (‘WOW!’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
sendkeys (‘WOW’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
sendkeys (‘WO’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
sendkeys (‘W’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
sendkeys (‘WO’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
sendkeys (‘WOW’)
keydown(13)
wait(5000)
keyup(13)
until(false)
end.

p.s sorry i messed up on it i forgot until (false) on it

p.s2 u can also use this for runescape just change where it says sendkeys

Read full topic
